Ders Dağıtım Programı
  • Database Modülü
  • Sayfa kaynağını görüntüle

Database Modülü

Bu modül, veritabanı işlemlerini yönetir.

Database Manager

class database.db_manager.DatabaseManager(db_path='schedule.db')[kaynak]

Bases: object

Manages database operations for the application

__init__(db_path='schedule.db')[kaynak]
__enter__()[kaynak]

Support use as a context manager: with DatabaseManager(…) as db: …

__exit__(exc_type, exc, tb)[kaynak]

Ensure connections are closed when exiting context manager.

__del__()[kaynak]

Destructor to ensure DB connection is closed to avoid ResourceWarning.

get_connection()[kaynak]

Get a thread-local database connection

close_connection()[kaynak]

Close the thread-local database connection

Get the school type from settings.

set_school_type(school_type: str) → bool[kaynak]

Set the school type in settings.

Get a setting value from the database.

set_setting(key: str, value: str | dict | list) → bool[kaynak]

Set a setting value in the database.

create_tables() → bool[kaynak]

Create database tables if they don’t exist

migrate_existing_data()[kaynak]

Handle schema migrations. Currently a placeholder.

close()[kaynak]

Close the database connection

add_lesson(name: str, weekly_hours: int = 0) → int | None[kaynak]

Add a new unique lesson name for the current school type via repository.

Get all unique lessons for the current school type via repository.

Get all curriculum entries for a specific lesson via repository.

Add or update weekly hours for a lesson at a specific grade via repository.

Add or update a curriculum entry for a lesson at a specific grade via repository.

Get the weekly hours for a specific lesson and grade via repository.

Get all teachers for the current school type via repository.

Get all classes for the current school type via repository.

Get a lesson by its ID via repository.

add_schedule_entry(class_id: int, teacher_id: int, lesson_id: int, classroom_id: int, day: int, time_slot: int) → int | None[kaynak]

Add a new schedule entry to schedule_entries table (assignments) via repository.

add_schedule_by_school_type(class_id: int, lesson_id: int, teacher_id: int, classroom_id: int = 0, day: int = -1, time_slot: int = -1) → int | None[kaynak]

Add a lesson assignment (without schedule details) via repository.

add_schedule_program(class_id: int, teacher_id: int, lesson_id: int, classroom_id: int, day: int, time_slot: int) → int | None[kaynak]

Add a new schedule program to schedule table (timetable) via repository.

Get schedule program for a specific class (from schedule table) via repository.

get_schedule_for_specific_teacher(teacher_id: int) → List[ScheduleEntry][kaynak]

Get schedule program for a specific teacher via repository.

update_schedule_entry(entry_id: int, class_id: int, teacher_id: int, lesson_id: int, classroom_id: int, day: int, time_slot: int) → bool[kaynak]

Update an existing schedule entry via repository.

delete_teacher(teacher_id: int) → bool[kaynak]

Delete a teacher and all related records via repository.

delete_schedule_entry(entry_id: int) → bool[kaynak]

Delete a single schedule entry by entry_id via repository.

delete_all_schedule_entries() → bool[kaynak]

Delete all schedule entries for the current school type via repository.

clear_schedule() → bool[kaynak]

Clear only the schedule table (not assignments) via repository.

delete_class(class_id: int) → bool[kaynak]

Delete a class via repository.

add_teacher(name: str, subject: str) → int | None[kaynak]

Add a new teacher via repository.

update_teacher(teacher_id: int, name: str, subject: str) → bool[kaynak]

Update an existing teacher via repository.

add_class(name: str, grade: int) → int | None[kaynak]

Add a new class via repository.

update_class(class_id: int, name: str, grade: int) → bool[kaynak]

Update an existing class via repository.

get_teacher_availability(teacher_id: int) → List[dict][kaynak]

Get teacher availability data via repository.

set_teacher_availability(teacher_id: int, day: int, time_slot: int, is_available: bool) → bool[kaynak]

Set teacher availability for a specific day and time slot via repository.

is_teacher_available(teacher_id: int, day: int, time_slot: int) → bool[kaynak]

Check if a teacher is available at a specific day and time slot via repository.

get_all_classrooms() → List[Classroom][kaynak]

Get all classrooms for the current school type via repository.

get_user(username: str, password: str) → User | None[kaynak]

Get a user by username and password

add_classroom(name: str, capacity: int) → int | None[kaynak]

Add a new classroom via repository.

get_all_curriculum() → List[Curriculum][kaynak]

Get all curriculum entries for the current school type via repository.

find_missing_assignments() → dict[kaynak]

Find missing lesson assignments for all classes. Returns a dictionary with structure: {

class_id: {

‘class’: Class object, ‘missing_lessons’: [(lesson_id, lesson_name, weekly_hours), …]

}

}

auto_fill_assignments() → dict[kaynak]

Automatically fill missing lesson assignments. Tries to match teachers by subject. Returns a dictionary with assignment results: {

‘success’: [(class_name, lesson_name, teacher_name), …], ‘failed’: [(class_name, lesson_name, reason), …]

}

Kullanım Örnekleri

Veritabanı Bağlantısı

from database.db_manager import DatabaseManager

# Veritabanı oluştur
db = DatabaseManager("schedule.db")

# Context manager ile kullan
with DatabaseManager("schedule.db") as db:
    classes = db.get_all_classes()

Sınıf Ekleme

# Sınıf ekle
class_id = db.add_class("9-A", 9)

# Sınıfları listele
classes = db.get_all_classes()
for cls in classes:
    print(f"{cls.name} - {cls.grade}")

Öğretmen Ekleme

# Öğretmen ekle
teacher_id = db.add_teacher("Ahmet Yılmaz", "Matematik")

# Öğretmenleri listele
teachers = db.get_all_teachers()

Ders Atama

# Ders atama ekle
assignment_id = db.add_lesson_assignment(
    class_id=1,
    lesson_id=2,
    teacher_id=3,
    weekly_hours=4
)
